name: TopDownShooter(WIP)
description:
If you want to play it, but have an iphone you can also play the HTML version: https://axtlos.itch.io/topdownshootermobilehtml

The Game doesn't have an end, so just go for a highscore

Controls(PC):

WASD - move

Left-click - shoot

Right-click - lay mines

ESC - open pause Menu

Controls(Mobile):

Left joystick - move

Right joystick - rotate (move the stick left to rotate counterclockwise and right to rotate clockwise)

Button under the right joystick - lay mines

Extra information:

sometimes, the walls of the stage doen't load properly. In that case either hit 'r' on your keyboard  or go under pause and press 'new level'.
